EmailTemplate.description: Send to customer when a partial cancellation is determined
EmailTemplate.name: Cancellation_Partial
EmailTemplate.subject: Five Star Cancellation Info
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.kugo2p__ContactBuying__c},
We have received your request to cancel your Five Star Professional order {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.Name} placed on {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.Release_Date__c}.
Your order is outside the five business day cancellation period. We have considered your reason for this request and have investigated the status of all of your products on this order.
At this time we are only able to offer a refund in the amount of <dollar amount> and a cancellation of <product(s)>. If you accept this offer of a partial cancel/refund please respond to this email for processing. We will place your order on hold for 48 hours as we wait to hear back from you. If we do not hear back from you during this time period, then this offer is null and void.
If you have any questions regarding this partial cancellations please contact Five Star Professional billing department at (888) 608-7161.
Kind regards,
Accounts Receivable Five Star Professional Phone: (888) 608-7161 | Email: billing@fivestarprofessional.com
